episodes.title: Imkansiz
episodes.plot: Eren receives the package that Serdar mailed while making his escape. Ramiz gives Tevfik his next mission. Ezel hires Mert for the hotel project.

episodes.title: Hiçbir seyi olmayan Adam
episodes.plot: Cengiz suspects Eysan is cheating on him and follows her. Ali persuades Sebnem to play hooky with him. Ezel tries to convince Eysan to leave Cengiz.

episodes.title: Son kabadayi
episodes.plot: Ezel asks Ali to join forces with him against Cengiz. A piece of jewelry triggers a flashback that leads Cengiz to a horrifying realization.

episodes.title: Baslangic - Bitis
episodes.plot: Ezel's plans spin out of control when Ramiz mysteriously disappears, Cengiz starts asking too many questions and Eysan makes a life-changing decision.

episodes.title: Küçük Hayat Büyük Adim
episodes.plot: Cengiz's tolerance of Eysan's humiliations reaches its limit. Ramiz plays the pitiful victim to regain the upper hand in the casino business.

episodes.title: Aile güzel bir hayaldir
episodes.plot: After making a shocking revelation, Tevfik calls Ali's bluff. Cengiz stalks a man he claims is Eysan's lover. Eysan is shown a note from Ömer.

episodes.title: Kirli zevklerimiz
episodes.plot: Eysan finds out what the key is for. When Cengiz tortures Eysan's supposed lover to make him confess, Ezel feels pressured to give himself up.

episodes.title: Akil ve kalp
episodes.plot: Mümtaz risks his health trying to reunite with Ömer. Refusing to give up his dream of taking down Ramiz, Ali ropes Cengiz and Ezel into helping him.

episodes.title: Gölge oyunu
episodes.plot: Mümtaz refuses to have life-saving surgery. Ramiz's only surviving betrayer tells a shocking story that changes the way Ezel views his mentor.

episodes.title: Iki ev
episodes.plot: Ezel finds a camcorder with footage that reveals the face of Ramiz's fourth child. Cengiz takes an interest in Ramiz's biographer.

episodes.title: iki Sehrin Hikayesi
episodes.plot: Azad is lured into a trap. Bahar issues an ultimatum when she finds her father has manipulated Eysan into providing him refuge in her home.

episodes.title: ip Ucu
episodes.plot: Ezel and Ramiz trick the assassin stalking Azad. Mert reveals his suspicions to Ezel. Bahar meets Ezel, but it's not the reunion she was hoping for.

episodes.title: Sirdas
episodes.plot: Mert visits Ramiz to confirm his suspicions, and later provokes Ali into unconsciously revealing where proof of Ömer's innocence can be found.

episodes.title: Tanisdigimiz Gün
episodes.plot: Ezel meets with Mert to reveal his true identity. Ramiz spares Ali's life in exchange for the promise of another's. Can receives a diagnosis.

episodes.title: Askta ve Savasta
episodes.plot: Ramiz finds Cengiz's weakness and leverages it to force him to do his bidding. Ezel, Ali and Eysan play along, aiming to get Cengiz arrested.

episodes.title: Mutlu Yillara
episodes.plot: Bahar visits Ezel to tell him of an important decision she's made. Ezel suggests to Cengiz that he take his family on a vacation overseas.

episodes.title: Saklamak - Gormek
episodes.plot: Ali is forced to finish a job for Ramiz that will incriminate Cengiz but put his own life at risk. Cengiz experiences exactly what Ömer once did.

episodes.title: Güzel ve Çirkin
episodes.plot: Now that Cengiz has been dealt with, Ezel moves on to his next target: Eysan. But a sudden emotional reaction leads him to make a change in plans.

episodes.title: Yeni Hayat
episodes.plot: Serdar spies on a newly released Ezel making plans with Eysan and Ali, and demands a piece of the action. In court, Eysan takes the witness stand.

episodes.title: Arda Kalan Her Sey
episodes.plot: When Eysan makes a sudden decision that threatens Ezel's plans for getting revenge against her, he throws caution to the wind to change her mind.

episodes.title: Utanç
episodes.plot: Serdar tells Cengiz what he witnessed while spying on Eysan, Ezel and Ali. Eysan begs Bahar for forgiveness. Ali realizes Bahar's cancer has returned.

episodes.title: Ücüncü Kisi
episodes.plot: After warning Eysan about Ezel, Cengiz receives a visit from him. Bahar makes a heartbreaking decision about what she'll do next with her life.

episodes.title: Ayrilsak da...
episodes.plot: A mysterious visitor seeks to exchange intel with Cengiz. Ezel makes a shocking declaration to Bahar. Eysan shares her suspicions about Ezel with Ali.

episodes.title: Tereddütler
episodes.plot: A visit with Cengiz shatters Ali's trust in Tevfik. Bahar confronts Ali about his betrayal of Ömer. Tevfik has a heart-to-heart talk with Sebnem.

episodes.title: Nikah ve Cenaze
episodes.plot: Tevfik is forced to choose between Ezel and Ali. Bahar asks Ezel a hypothetical question, and later learns her father was involved in betraying Ömer.

episodes.title: Zamansiz
episodes.plot: Cengiz learns the significance of the number 12 etched on his arm. When Ali refuses to give in to Ramiz, Ezel and his team must rescue hostage Tevfik.

episodes.title: Kurtar Beni
episodes.plot: Cengiz is extracted from prison, but must pay a price afterward. Ezel gets himself in a room alone with Ali, who reveals a secret about Tevfik.

episodes.title: Yasanmamis Hayatlar
episodes.plot: Bahar learns Eysan lied in court to put Cengiz in prison, causing her to question her sister's motive for betraying Ömer. Tevfik says his goodbyes.

episodes.title: Intikam
episodes.plot: Sebnem goes to see Tevfik one last time. Cengiz lays a trap to get Eysan alone in the house. Eysan and Ezel let go of everything holding them back.

episodes.title: Kücük hayat büyük Adim
episodes.plot: Ali receives a clue to the link between Ezel and Ramiz. Eysan learns someone has already bought her confiscated properties. Bahar cuts ties with Ezel.

episodes.title: Güzel Günler
episodes.plot: Ali visits the military hospital where Ömer was treated. Eysan confesses her dark sin to Ezel. Mümtaz learns what Cengiz and his friends did to Ömer.

episodes.title: Güzel Günlerdi
episodes.plot: Ali is given a chance to redeem himself. Ezel loses a friend. Mümtaz won't forgive himself for not believing that Ömer was innocent.

episodes.title: Elimde Kalanlar
episodes.plot: Bahar offers Ali a deal. Meliha questions Mümtaz's closeness to Can. Ezel makes Eysan feel the same way Ömer did when he realized he'd been betrayed.

episodes.title: Yalniz Bir Adam
episodes.plot: Eysan makes a difficult sacrifice, leaving behind a revealing letter. When Ezel goes alone to meet Ramiz's nemesis, he's greeted by a surprise.

episodes.title: Mükemmel Bir Cinayet
episodes.plot: Ali wants to redeem himself by sacrificing his life. Bahar offers words of encouragement to Ezel, who is convinced he's incapable of loving his son.

episodes.title: Imkansiz Ask Yoktur
episodes.plot: Ali accompanies Bahar to the hospital, where she gets test results. Ezel offers Ali a path to redemption. Bahar asks Eysan to do what's best for Can.

episodes.title: Mutlu Sonlara Kim Inanir?
episodes.plot: Cengiz watches helplessly as a horrifying scene unfolds. Ezel learns who masterminded Ömer's betrayal, and what Eysan's motive was for cooperating.

episodes.title: ...Ama Herkes Ölmez
episodes.plot: Tevfik stands up against Ramiz. After Ezel hears Kenan's side of the story, he questions Ramiz's trustworthiness. Serdar re-enters Eysan's life.
